import React, { useState } from 'react' import axios from 'axios' const Login = () => { const [email ,setEmail] = useState() const [password ,setPassword]= useState() const handleSubmit = async (e) => { e.preventDefault(); const formData = new FormData(); formData.append("email", email) formData.append("password",password) const Employee =axios.post('http://localhost:8000/company/userLogin',formData) console.log() } return ( <>

Login

setEmail(e.target.email)} placeholder=" UserName" required />
setPassword(e.target.password)} placeholder="Password" required/>
) } export default Login
